SEARCH
Package battleship.controller

Class ServerController

java.lang.Object
battleship.controller.ServerController
public class ServerController extends Object
The ServerController class handles the server-side and client-side networking for the Battleship game. It manages connections, data transmission, and game synchronization between the host and the client.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Enum to define the types of messages that can be sent between the client and server.

  • Constructor Details

    • ServerController

      public ServerController(BattleshipController controller, BattleshipModel model, LocalizationLoader loader, String name, int port, String address)
      Constructor for the ServerController class.
      Parameters:
      controller - The BattleshipController instance.
      model - The BattleshipModel instance.
      loader - The LocalizationLoader instance for loading localization strings.
      name - The name of the player.
      port - The port number to host/connect to the server.
      address - The address of the server. If null, the local host address is used.
